website_summaries.verdict: This kids' smartwatch has all the features kids and parents love, including responsive technology and GPS. Looks good, too.
pros: Has a sporty-looking style that comes in several colors
Can make phone calls and track kids' steps and fitness activities
Parents can use the GPS monitoring system to keep track of kids
cons: Some reports of poor battery life and defective watches

customer_reviews.title: It works and it’s cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this watch as a gift for solstice, we got it all setup, added the 5$ suggested sim that we purchased with it and it works! Took us a minute to figure out how to adjust the time (had to google GMT) but it makes calls. For the price it’s the perfect starter watch phone for our 7 & 10 year old. We bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Wyldmum

customer_reviews.title: Run away!
customer_reviews.text: My husband did his own search and decided to buy this watch. He spent hours after Christmas trying to set it up. He couldn't even turn it on, when he finally was able, nothing was working. I ran the reviews through Review Meta to search for suspicious reviews and it gave a warning signal (there are 3 ratings: pass/warn/fail). Check for yourself. We sent that watch back and bought a gizmo. Of course it's 3 times the price, but it works...Don't let those reviews fool you. I hope we get our money back.
customer_reviews.author: Hyacinthe

customer_reviews.title: 1- 4 mile error with real positioning. (clearly stated in directions.
customer_reviews.text: On the website description, I had a very difficult time finding what type of range the GPS offers. Finally got the delivery today, and the directions it clearly states there is a 1 to 4 mile error with real positioning. If one is buying for an accurate GPS watch tracker... Save your time and save your money. The seller should make this very clear. A variance from 1 to 4 mile error with real position is absolutely ridiculous. How can you locate your child when you know they are between one and 4 miles in a given vicinity. Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: FGM

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Thought I had struck gold but gold it was not. This watch does not text. Child can send a voice recording and send it to the app. The App is not user friendly and many ads pop up. My purchase in particular did not hold a charge. I decided to return it after I took it off the charger in the morning and put it up, then tried to turn it on later in the day and the battery was dead. It wasn't even being used. Not worth it. Cannot cut corners on this. I'm going to shop for a more expensive brand that will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Holly M White

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: GARBAGE! I returned right after the hassle of set up! All the good reviews on here are bought for free time on your plan, set a good review and they pay for a couple months of activation and honestly it is not even worth that! The packaging was awful, the set up was hard the watch itself didnt seem to preform half of what it was supposed to we ended up buying a gizmo through our plan and it was a night and day different dont waste your time and money your child will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: BrBailey

customer_reviews.title: Smart watch with GPS Tracking
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for kids. I bought this as a gift and my nephew loves it. You need to buy a sim for all its functions to work. Has a quick game to keep kids busy. GPS tracking is really helpful in knowing where your kid is. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Saurav

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvements
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are written in very poor English. The watch app is horrible. So far the watches say offline even tho I can call them. I don’t see how I can hear or see thru the watch camera via the app. The app is the worst downfall besides the hard to follow directions on setting them up
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. The instructions are so tiny you need magnifying glass to read. Worse, the instructions are such horrible English it makes no sense. Couldn’t even figure it out. Major RED FLAG! Don’t buy and amazon stop business with this product.
customer_reviews.author: JMM

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Takes forever to figure out how to set up, and the app won’t even connect to the watch. Without the app, the watch is basically useless. You get what you pay for, which is a hunk of garbage. Oh, and the app is full of advertisements too. Waste of time and money. I’ll keep trying to figure this damn thing out and come back with an update if I do to help anybody else going through the same thing!
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly in Colombia
customer_reviews.text: I must say that I had my doubts, but my daughter wanted it and my father-in-law asked me to buy it . It works perfectly and as a father lets me know where my daughter is and communicate easily with her. Super recommended
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Smart Watch Not So Smart
customer_reviews.text: I have called all sorts of customer service to try to get this "smart" to work properly. The time is set to military time and will not allow manual manipulation. The time zone continues to convert to the continent of Asia and we have set the location to GMT 5:00/East Coast NYC several times. We purchased a pre paid sim for calls and still, this smart watch is not allowing the priper set up to fit the child's needs.
customer_reviews.author: AMR

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: This was a fail! The watches came with loose bands and when you tried to strap it on your wrist the metal pieces snap off and it falls right off. We got 2, one will not connect to the app, and the other will not communicate with the app, the original or the 2and versions. The battery time is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smart watch for my daughter for Christmas. It was advertised as waterproof but the one I bought is definitely not. She jumped into a pool with watch on and water entered watch. Initially turned off and then took many days for water marks inside watch to disappear and to return to working order. Was going to request return/refund but postal service from SA is a bit of a joke so just kept it as it was not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Karshagen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these watches for my son and daughter. I am terribly disappointed in this watch. It will not connect to the app that allows a parent to track their children, set up a phone book etc. Calling works fine but texting does not function. The battery does not last die more than a few hours at a time, and the buckle on my daughters watch fell odd the band just 2 days after she started wearing it. I will be returning these watches and looking for others.
customer_reviews.author: MissouriMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Smart Watch
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this smart watch for our 10 year old grandson for Christmas. Great value for the price and basically does everything the competitors watch does. Very happy with our purchase and believe our grandson was a very happy fella. Highly recommend this watch to anyone that’s wanting to purchase for a young child!
customer_reviews.author: Linda T

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I seriously don't understand why this has such a good review rating. The instructions are like someone who Googled the English words wrote them, they're cheap and half the time the calls won't go through at all. Super dissatisfied and would absolutely not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Watch did not even keep the time correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch for a ten year old boy. Graphics and characters on the watch were to juvenile for this age group. The watch did not keep time and really was a problem to set up. I returned the watch because I was not at all satisfied with the product. Directions were also ridiculously. Had to use a magnifying glass because the type was so small.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: not waterproof. waste of money...lasted a few days...after my son washed his hands was full of bubbles and died.....
customer_reviews.author: YK

customer_reviews.title: review.
customer_reviews.text: I got it for the features, but the GPS system on it is wrong. Tells me my kid is 2 blocks away with the watch but he's sitting right next to me. Doesn't receive any text messages. But can get phone calls. Honestly thinking about returning it but my kid is already in love with it. 😑
customer_reviews.author: Tajah B

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Junk
customer_reviews.text: I am fed up with Amazon and the massive inventory of s****y, imitation products that are essentially useless. This "watch" is the embodiment of the junk found on Amazon. We were barely able to get this thing to work and then when we did, my son accidentally dropped it. The screen went blank and that was it. This watch is useless. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: vagran

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money or time! These watches are pretty much worthless. I sent them back!
customer_reviews.author: trogrovest

customer_reviews.title: Hmm
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great watch but didn’t get much time to try it out because it didn’t come with a charging cord. Hopefully they will send me one.
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: About 1 in 10 of the features of this watch worked. Not the same one, and not all of the time. If this was intended to give you peace of mind, it does NOT deliver.
customer_reviews.author: smack

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this watch as a gift for solstice, we got it all setup, added the 5$ suggested sim that we purchased with it and it works! Took us a minute to figure out how to adjust the time (had to google GMT) but it makes calls.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Sending back
customer_reviews.text: Could not get product to work. Sending back. Instructions are too small to read and grammatically hard to follow.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Watch! NOT as described!
customer_reviews.text: NOT AS DESCRIBED! App is not user friendly by any means. Very difficult to navigate around, message your child, or track them. TOO MANY ADS! Cannot remote access your child's watch like it describes. It awlays sends SOS when child tries to access their watch. Unhappy all together with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to set up, worked for 5 minutes then went into Sim refreshing mode for 2 days. App not connecting to phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Hamada

customer_reviews.title: Charging area defective.
customer_reviews.text: The charging area of the watch is defective. The charger cable doesn’t attach correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Z

customer_reviews.title: To receive what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: Came without charging cable! States in the description that it should have one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazokissablelips2u2

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Works well....but my son only wore four a couple weeks before the band broke. So its not meant for active children. Not durable
customer_reviews.author: donnie

customer_reviews.title: worse watch ever
customer_reviews.text: this was the worse purchase of my life. Even my son could not get this programmed right. Plus you have to buy service. worst watch ever for children.
customer_reviews.author: Greentree

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed, terrible functionality, c
customer_reviews.text: Watch was a Christmas gift for my son. Got it on Dec 25, got SIM card Jan 2nd, wore it 4 days and it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly.  Impossible to set up!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been impossible to get this watch operational. Instructions are not easy to follow in addition to needing a magnifying glass to read them. Waste of tine. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! This is a total piece of junk. From the microscopic instruction booklet with font about the size of a nanometer to none of the functions even remotely working, it is a TOTAL piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: cpa33

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Shame on me to think that this was going to be more than a bad experience. Cheaply made, pain to program, etc. Spend more money and get a name brand piece of equipment
customer_reviews.author: scott fraser

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for 5-8 yr olds
customer_reviews.text: To immature for my 11 yr old more for8 yr old
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly.  needs an update that is not available
customer_reviews.text: Useless - When getting the app for the tracking, all it said, was it needed a new version and the window closed; no further link
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Weisenbach

customer_reviews.title: Broken Goods
customer_reviews.text: The band is broke already!!! And it's only been 1 week since he's had it again and it broke the second day. But my kid loves the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneith jones

customer_reviews.title: Need assistance to activate
customer_reviews.text: Hello, need some assistance to activate the watch. I'm in Peru, South America. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Good watch for the price for my 8 year old! I can call him and he can call me from it!
customer_reviews.author: Carlitta L. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Returned. A nightmare to set up. Mobile app not what was expected
customer_reviews.author: Beach Bouff

product_meta.title: Kids Smart Watch GPS Tracker - Waterproof GPS Tracker Watch for Children Girls Boys with SOS Call Camera Touch Screen Game Alarm for Kids Boys and Girls (Black)
